## kira-trending gt

View GitHub trending repositories

### Synopsis

A simple command-line tool to view GitHub trending repositories

```
kira-trending gt [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for gt
  -l, --limit int   view the top N trending repositories (default 10) (default 10)
```
